title: Droven cloak
data:
- *For the armor in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), see [dark elven cloak](/wiki/Dark_elven_cloak "Dark elven cloak").*

| \[   droven cloak   [![Droven cloak.png](/images/9/9f/Droven_cloak.png)](/wiki/File:Droven_cloak.png) |                                                                                                     |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                            | cobwebbed cloak                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                       |                                                                                                     |
| Slot                                                                                                  | [cloak](/wiki/Cloak "Cloak")                                                                        |
| AC                                                                                                    | [0](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")                                                                |
| Special                                                                                               | * [MC3](/wiki/MC3 "MC3")
* [apply](/wiki/Apply "Apply") to create or remove [webs](/wiki/Web "Web") |
|                                                                                                       |                                                                                                     |
| Base price                                                                                            | 60 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                    |
| Weight                                                                                                | [10](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                         |
| Material                                                                                              | [cloth](/wiki/Cloth "Cloth")                                                                        |

A **droven cloak** is a type of [cloak](/wiki/Cloak "Cloak") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). It is always made of [cloth](/wiki/Cloth "Cloth"), and appears as a **cobwebbed cloak** when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

The droven cloak is the [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") for three [quest artifacts](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact"): [The Web of the Chosen](/wiki/The_Web_of_the_Chosen "The Web of the Chosen"), [the Darkweaver's Cloak](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Darkweaver.27s_Cloak "DNetHack artifacts"), and [the Cloak of the Consort](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Cloak_of_the_Consort "DNetHack artifacts").

## Generation

Several [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)") monsters [generate with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") droven cloaks:

- [A'salom](/wiki/A%27salom "A'salom"), the [Hedrow Noble quest](/wiki/Hedrow_Noble_quest "Hedrow Noble quest") leader, is generated with a droven cloak.
- [Mother](/wiki/Mother "Mother"), the [Drow Noble quest](/wiki/Drow_Noble_quest "Drow Noble quest") leader, is generated with a blessed, [erosion](/wiki/Erosion "Erosion")-proofed +0 droven cloak.
- The [sisters](/wiki/Sister "Sister") that act as the Drow Noble quest guardians are generated with droven cloaks.
- [Sister T'eirastra](/index.php?title=Sister_T%27eirastra\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Sister T'eirastra (page does not exist)"), the [Drow Healer quest](/index.php?title=Drow_Healer_quest\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drow Healer quest (page does not exist)") leader, is generated with a droven cloak.
- [Driders](/wiki/Drider_\(dNetHack\) "Drider (dNetHack)") and [sprow](/wiki/Sprow "Sprow") generated on the home level of any drow-related [quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") other than the [Drow Healer quest](/index.php?title=Drow_Healer_quest\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drow Healer quest (page does not exist)") are created with cursed [erosion](/wiki/Erosion "Erosion")-proofed +3 droven cloaks.
- [Y-cultist](/index.php?title=Y-cultist\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Y-cultist (page does not exist)") monsters always generate with thoroughly tattered droven cloaks.
- [Drow matrons](/wiki/Drow_matron "Drow matron"), [drow matron-mothers](/wiki/Drow_matron-mother "Drow matron-mother"), and [yochlol](/wiki/Yochlol "Yochlol") generated in unearthly drow form are always generated with droven cloaks.
- [Drow mummies](/wiki/Drow_mummy_\(dNetHack\) "Drow mummy (dNetHack)"), [hedrow wizards](/wiki/Hedrow_wizard "Hedrow wizard"), [hedrow master-wizards](/wiki/Hedrow_master-wizard "Hedrow master-wizard"), [hedrow blademasters](/wiki/Hedrow_blademaster "Hedrow blademaster") and driders are always generated with droven cloaks.
- [Myrkalfar warriors](/index.php?title=Myrkalfar_warrior\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Myrkalfar warrior (page does not exist)") always generate with non-cursed +2 or +3 droven cloaks.
- [Dokkalfar eternal matriarchs](/wiki/Dokkalfar_eternal_matriarch "Dokkalfar eternal matriarch") in the [Anachrononaut quest](/wiki/Anachrononaut_quest "Anachrononaut quest") are generated with cursed +5 [magic-resistant](/wiki/Object_properties#Defensive "Object properties") droven cloaks.
- [Mindless thralls](/wiki/Mindless_thrall "Mindless thrall") always generate with cursed and thoroughly tattered droven cloaks with an enchantment from -1 to -3.
- [Mendicant driders](/index.php?title=Mendicant_drider\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Mendicant drider (page does not exist)") and [mendicant sprow](/index.php?title=Mendicant_sprow\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Mendicant sprow (page does not exist)") are always generated with blue droven cloaks.
- The [Avatar of Lolth](/wiki/Avatar_of_Lolth "Avatar of Lolth") is always generated with a blessed, erosion-proofed +5 droven cloak.
- Other drow monsters always generate with droven cloaks.

[Deminymphs](/wiki/Deminymph "Deminymph") that are generated with healer kits on the [Drow Healer quest](/index.php?title=Drow_Healer_quest\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Drow Healer quest (page does not exist)") are always generated with blue droven cloaks. Deminymphs that are randomly generated outside of the Drow Healer quest or the Lost Cities have an effective 1⁄160 chance of being given a madperson kit with a droven cloak that has an enchantment of +1 to +3 and a 1⁄40 chance to be made into an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact").

[Giant spiders](/wiki/Giant_spider "Giant spider") and [cave lizards](/index.php?title=Cave_lizard_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Cave lizard (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") have a 1⁄20 chance of generating with droven cloaks fitted to their body shape, while [large cave lizards](/index.php?title=Large_cave_lizard_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Large cave lizard (dNetHack) (page does not exist)") have a 11⁄100 chance of generating with fitted droven cloaks.

## Description

While worn, a droven cloak grants 0 base [AC](/wiki/AC "AC"), 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and [MC3](/wiki/MC3 "MC3"). [Applying](/wiki/Apply "Apply") a droven cloak can lay down [webs](/wiki/Web "Web") on adjacent squares, which lowers the magic cancellation of the cloak by 1 and will use up the cloak when its MC reaches 0 - this can also be used to 'pick up' existing webs, which removes them and restores the MC of the cloak (up to a maximum of 3).

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Droven_cloak\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Droven cloak

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For the armor in EvilHack, see dark elven cloak.
[   droven cloak  
Appearance cobwebbed cloak
Slot cloak
AC 0
Special
  • MC3
  • apply to create or remove webs
Base price 60 zm
Weight 10
Material cloth

A droven cloak is a type of cloak that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. It is always made of cloth, and appears as a cobwebbed cloak when unidentified.

The droven cloak is the base item for three quest artifacts: The Web of the Chosen, the Darkweaver's Cloak, and the Cloak of the Consort.

Generation

Several drow monsters generate with droven cloaks:

  • A'salom, the Hedrow Noble quest leader, is generated with a droven cloak.
  • Mother, the Drow Noble quest leader, is generated with a blessed, erosion-proofed +0 droven cloak.
  • The sisters that act as the Drow Noble quest guardians are generated with droven cloaks.
  • Sister T'eirastra, the Drow Healer quest leader, is generated with a droven cloak.
  • Driders and sprow generated on the home level of any drow-related quest other than the Drow Healer quest are created with cursed erosion-proofed +3 droven cloaks.
  • Y-cultist monsters always generate with thoroughly tattered droven cloaks.
  • Drow matrons, drow matron-mothers, and yochlol generated in unearthly drow form are always generated with droven cloaks.
  • Drow mummies, hedrow wizards, hedrow master-wizards, hedrow blademasters and driders are always generated with droven cloaks.
  • Myrkalfar warriors always generate with non-cursed +2 or +3 droven cloaks.
  • Dokkalfar eternal matriarchs in the Anachrononaut quest are generated with cursed +5 magic-resistant droven cloaks.
  • Mindless thralls always generate with cursed and thoroughly tattered droven cloaks with an enchantment from -1 to -3.
  • Mendicant driders and mendicant sprow are always generated with blue droven cloaks.
  • The Avatar of Lolth is always generated with a blessed, erosion-proofed +5 droven cloak.
  • Other drow monsters always generate with droven cloaks.

Deminymphs that are generated with healer kits on the Drow Healer quest are always generated with blue droven cloaks. Deminymphs that are randomly generated outside of the Drow Healer quest or the Lost Cities have an effective 1⁄160 chance of being given a madperson kit with a droven cloak that has an enchantment of +1 to +3 and a 1⁄40 chance to be made into an artifact.

Giant spiders and cave lizards have a 1⁄20 chance of generating with droven cloaks fitted to their body shape, while large cave lizards have a 11⁄100 chance of generating with fitted droven cloaks.

Description

While worn, a droven cloak grants 0 base AC, 0 DR and MC3. Applying a droven cloak can lay down webs on adjacent squares, which lowers the magic cancellation of the cloak by 1 and will use up the cloak when its MC reaches 0 - this can also be used to 'pick up' existing webs, which removes them and restores the MC of the cloak (up to a maximum of 3).

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Droven_cloak&oldid=167733"

|cost=60 |weight=10 |material=cloth }} A '''droven cloak''' is a type of [[cloak]] that appears in [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]]. It is always made of [[cloth]], and appears as a '''cobwebbed cloak''' when [[identification|unidentified]]. The droven cloak is the [[base item]] for three [[quest artifact]]s: [[The Web of the Chosen]], [[dNetHack artifacts#Darkweaver's Cloak|the Darkweaver's Cloak]], and [[dNetHack artifacts#Cloak of the Consort|the Cloak of the Consort]]. ==Generation== Several [[Drow (monster attribute)|drow]] monsters [[Monster starting inventory|generate with]] droven cloaks: * [[A'salom]], the [[Hedrow Noble quest]] leader, is generated with a droven cloak. * [[Mother]], the [[Drow Noble quest]] leader, is generated with a blessed, [[erosion]]-proofed +0 droven cloak. * The [[sister]]s that act as the Drow Noble quest guardians are generated with droven cloaks. * [[Sister T'eirastra]], the [[Drow Healer quest]] leader, is generated with a droven cloak. * [[Drider (dNetHack)|Driders]] and [[sprow]] generated on the home level of any drow-related [[quest]] other than the [[Drow Healer quest]] are created with cursed [[erosion]]-proofed +3 droven cloaks. * [[Y-cultist]] monsters always generate with thoroughly tattered droven cloaks. * [[Drow matron]]s, [[drow matron-mother]]s, and [[yochlol]] generated in unearthly drow form are always generated with droven cloaks. * [[Drow mummy (dNetHack)|Drow mummies]], [[hedrow wizard]]s, [[hedrow master-wizard]]s, [[hedrow blademaster]]s and driders are always generated with droven cloaks. * [[Myrkalfar warrior]]s always generate with non-cursed +2 or +3 droven cloaks. * [[Dokkalfar eternal matriarch]]s in the [[Anachrononaut quest]] are generated with cursed +5 [[Object properties#Defensive|magic-resistant]] droven cloaks. * [[Mindless thrall]]s always generate with cursed and thoroughly tattered droven cloaks with an enchantment from -1 to -3. * [[Mendicant drider]]s and [[mendicant sprow]] are always generated with blue droven cloaks. * The [[Avatar of Lolth]] is always generated with a blessed, erosion-proofed +5 droven cloak. * Other drow monsters always generate with droven cloaks. [[Deminymph]]s that are generated with healer kits on the [[Drow Healer quest]] are always generated with blue droven cloaks. Deminymphs that are randomly generated outside of the Drow Healer quest or the Lost Cities have an effective {{frac|160}} chance of being given a madperson kit with a droven cloak that has an enchantment of +1 to +3 and a {{frac|40}} chance to be made into an [[artifact]]. [[Giant spider]]s and [[Cave lizard (dNetHack)|cave lizards]] have a {{frac|20}} chance of generating with droven cloaks fitted to their body shape, while [[Large cave lizard (dNetHack)|large cave lizards]] have a {{frac|11|100}} chance of generating with fitted droven cloaks. ==Description== While worn, a droven cloak grants 0 base [[AC]], 0 [[DR]] and [[MC3]]. [[Apply]]ing a droven cloak can lay down [[web]]s on adjacent squares, which lowers the magic cancellation of the cloak by 1 and will use up the cloak when its MC reaches 0 - this can also be used to 'pick up' existing webs, which removes them and restores the MC of the cloak (up to a maximum of 3). {{stub}} {{variant-343}} [[Category:dNetHack cloaks]] [[Category:dNetHack droven items|Cloak]] [[Category:notdNetHack cloaks]] [[Category:notdNetHack droven items|Cloak]]
